channel.title: Quickstart on c3os documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Quickstart on c3os documentation

item.title: Installation
item.description: Introduction The c3OS relases ships for user convenience a set of artifacts that can be used to install c3os on a node. However, c3OS Kubernetes Native components allows to create such artifacts inside Kubernetes from a set of input images. In the quickstart below we will use the artifacts generated by the c3os releases as we assume we don’t have any prior Kubernetes cluster available. Most of the operations are completely automated, so there is little interaction needed with the Kubernetes components.
